file_content.text: Jedi = General? // T7 = hoped for better
Jedi + Master = T7 proud!
T7 = glad to serve // Next time = Jedi's turn to rescue friends
T7 = never ignore call for help // Jedi behavior = confusing + disappointing
T7 = always happy to see Master Satele
Mission = success // Time to leave = now
T7 = accessing temple network + deactivating ray shield + checking on strike team // Jedi = stand by
Alert! // Jedi friend Doc = surrounded by enemies + injured
Alert! // Jedi friend Kira = surrounded by enemies + injured
Alert! // Jedi friend Sergeant Rusk = surrounded by enemies + injured
Current estimated survival odds = 21,537,668 to 1 // If Jedi helps, estimated survival odds = 3 to 1
Can't argue with those numbers. Tell me where I'm going.
Let's go save our friend.
T7 = transmitting coordinates now // Jedi = help Doc fast!
T7 = transmitting coordinates now // Jedi = help Kira fast!
T7 = transmitting coordinates now // Jedi = help Sergeant Rusk fast!
Cutting ray shield power = automated process + time-consuming // Path = clear when Jedi + Teeseven return
I need to face the Emperor. Get this ray shield down--now.
The Emperor comes first.
Jedi = abandoning a friend? // Decision = incorrect!
Ray shield = deactivating // Jedi path = clear
T7 unit = blending in with Imperial droids // Jedi = not blending in with Sith
Ship = landed safely // T7 = scanning for enemy detection
Dromund Kaas = Sith Empire capitol // Odds of returning alive = unable to calculate
What are the estimated odds of survival if you leave the shuttle and make the rescue for me?
You could go help instead.
Estimated survival odds with T7's help = 30 to 1
See if you can improve those odds, Teeseven. I'm counting on you.
That will have to do.
T7 = pushing circuits to max! // T7 = not letting down Jedi + friend!
Sounds like I'm the better bet. Tell me where to go, Teeseven.
Never mind, I'll handle it.
It's not worth risking you, and I have to focus on defeating the Emperor. Deactivate this ray shield.
Teeseven, come in. There's a ray shield between me and the Emperor. Can you do anything about it?
The Emperor will have to wait.
